product_name: Mountain Hardwear Thermostatic Hooded Jacket - Men's
long_description: Wear the super lightweight Mountain Hardwear Thermostatic Hooded men's jacket with synthetic insulation when you want warmth without weight. Its low-profile design makes it layer and travel easily.
short_description: Wear the super lightweight Mountain Hardwear Thermostatic Hooded men's jacket with synthetic insulation when you want warmth without weight. Its low-profile design makes it layer and travel easily.
